name: Benji's Tale
description:
Milo  awakens to find himself in a weird dungeon. He comes across a lonely beast named Benji. Not knowing how he got there, Milo begins exploring this mysterious and wacky place. Benji decides to tag along and annoy Milo.....

Gameplay video:
